summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 30388 entitled: "An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of an alley through block 74 in Gilman Park, an addition to the City of Seattle; providing for the taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor and providing that the cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law" approved November 26, 1912, and published December 2, 1912.
